title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 943.2 - General Provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 943.2 - General Provisions

State Regulations
(a) The

Commission has jurisdiction over Lobbyists, Clients of Lobbyists, and Public

Corporations pursuant to section 1-d of the Lobbying Act and section
94
of the

Executive Law. (b) Pursuant to
section 1-s of the Lobbying Act, all documents submitted as part of a Lobbyist
or Client Statement or Report are available for public inspection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
943.2

Adopted

New

York State Register May 9, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 19, eff. 1/1/2019

Amended

New

York State Register February 10, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 06, eff. 2/10/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
